amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for the implementation of the EPA's social cost of carbon rule.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 44 printed in House Report 115-830 to prohibit funds from implementing the Social Cost of Carbon rule.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A040) Agreed to by recorded vote: 215 - 199 (Roll no. 347).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Mullin.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
